name: Fru (itch)
description:
A game I made at the end of my first year of college. Inspired by John Frusciante of the Red Hot Chili Peppers' interview with VPRO in 92, I made a surreal environment that plays quotes from his interview.

He was a heroin junkie and the interview really highlights his acceptance and lack of shame too and I wanted to make a game that highlights that.

I'd love feedback on what you think!
